title: What is information technology system? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here the two things comes which is Information technology and Information System INFORMATION SYSTEM - An information system can be defined as set of coordinated network of components, which act together towards producing, distributing and or processing information. An important characteristic of computer-based information systems information is precision, which may not apply to other types. INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY - Information technology can be broadly defined as integration of computer with telecommunication equipment for storing, retrieving, manipulating and storage of data. According to Information Technology Association of America, information technology is defined as “the study, design, development, application, implementation, support or management of computer-based information systems.”Information technology has brought big change in our daily life be it education, life at home, work place, communication and even in function of government.

Information technology system is a ‘System’ in which you can process data and get it in meaningful way. Today’s smartphones are perfect example of a IT system, for example they take bits and bytes from stored Photo and display it on screen, take same bits and bytes from email server and show you the content in legible language. My smartphone is feeling/getting my input as I write, send it to Quora server and will show you readable answer on your screen after receiving digital bits.
